mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE(id, cafe_name, biz_number, tel, address_code, address_detail, operating_time, cafe_info, registration_date, update_date, social_media, wifi, reservation, parking_space, no_kids_zone, with_pet, cafe_condition, cafe_registration) VALUES (#{id}, #{cafeName}, #{bizNumber}, #{tel}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail}, #{operatingTime}, #{cafeInfo}, #{socialMedia}, now(), now(), #{wifi}, #{reservation}, #{parkingSpace}, #{noKidsZone}, #{withPet}, #{cafeCondition}, #{cafeRegistration})
mapper.select: SELECT id, hashtag_id, cafe_name, biz_number, tel, address_code, address_detail, operating_time, cafe_info, social_media, cafe_registration, registration_date, update_date, wifi, reservation, parking_space, no_kids_zone, with_pet, cafe_condition, cafe_registration FROM cafe WHERE id = #{id}
